title: Upgrade Your PC or ELSE - BROKE vs PRO
description: Check out what we got from Micro Center!  Ken's Setup: Intel Core i7-12700K:  Gigabyte Z690 Aorus Elite:  Gigabyte NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4070 12GB Graphics Card:  Inland Performance 1TB M.2 SSD:  DeepCool PQ850M 850 Watt PSU:  Noctua NH-D15S Chromax CPU Cooler:  Noctua NF-F12 PWM SSO2 120mm Case Fan:   Corsair VENGEANCE RGB Pro SL 32GB DDR4-3600 Memory:  Fractal Design North Tempered Glass ATX Mid-Tower Case:  Corsair XENEON 27" 240Hz Gaming Monitor:  Sony INZONE H9 Wireless Noise Cancelling Gaming Headset:   MELGEEK Mojo68 Mechanical Keyboard:  Glorious Model O Wireless Gaming Mouse:  Corsair MM350 Mouse Pad - Extended XL:   Austin's Upgrades: Sparkle Intel Arc A750 ORC 8GB Graphics Card:  Crucial BX500 480GB SATA III SSD:  AOC 21.5" 75Hz Monitor:   3-in-1 Gaming Combo:   Subscribe for more!  TikTok:  Instagram:  Twitter:  Threads:   Chapter Titles: 0:00 PC Build vs Upgrade 1:02 Preparations Aren't Cheating 3:25 How Hard Could It Be? 5:17 Ken's Genius Plan 7:08 Time To Build a PC 9:01 Nothing Could Go Wrong Now 10:50 The Reveal 13:47 Gaming Head to Head 15:44 Price to Performance 16:28 The Winner Is...
